item.title: 国防和航天公司合作研制轨道飞行器以执行国家安全任务
item.description: 由风险投资支持的 Impulse Space 公司和武器制造商 Anduril Industries 公司正在开发一种增压间谍飞行器，能够在轨道上为美国政府及其盟国执行国家安全任务。【原文：Venture-backed Impulse Space Inc. and weapons maker Anduril Industries Inc. are developing a supercharged spy vehicle capable of carrying out national security missions in orbit for the US government and its allies.】

item.title: 梅洛尼官员急于为意大利预算截止日期增加收入
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的政府在最后一刻急于寻找新的增收途径，因为它要为向意大利选民承诺的赠款提供资金。【原文：Premier Giorgia Meloni’s government faces a last-minute rush to find new ways of raising revenue as it seeks to fund promised giveaways to Italian voters, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易员减少美联储减息押注，美元延续周线升势
item.description: 由于预计美联储将放慢降息步伐，交易商正推动美元连续第二周上涨。【原文：Traders are pushing the dollar toward its second-straight weekly gain in anticipation of a slower pace of interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 中国因涉嫌贿赂调查苹果手机城的台湾员工
item.description: 据北京国台办消息，中国当局正在调查苹果公司的主要组装合作伙伴鸿海精密工业股份有限公司的四名台湾员工，他们涉嫌包括贿赂在内的犯罪活动。【原文：Chinese authorities are investigating four Taiwanese employees at Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Apple Inc.’s main assembly partner, for suspected criminal activities including bribery, according to Beijing’s Taiwan Affairs Office.】

item.title: 尼日利亚签署为价值 33 亿美元的甲醇厂供应天然气的协议
item.description: 尼日利亚国家石油公司（Nigerian National Petroleum Corp.）与壳牌、道达尔能源（TotalEnergies）和阿吉普（Agip）等合作伙伴达成了一项具有里程碑意义的协议，向该国黄铜化肥石化有限公司（Brass Fertilizer & Petrochemical Co.Ltd.【原文：Nigerian National Petroleum Corp. and partners including Shell, TotalEnergies and Agip struck a landmark deal to sell gas to the methanol-manufacturing project of the country’s Brass Fertilizer & Petrochemical Co. Ltd.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与阿达尼公司签署价值 7.36 亿美元的电力线路项目协议
item.description: 肯尼亚能源部长 Opiyo Wandayi 表示，肯尼亚与阿达尼能源解决方案有限公司签署了一项价值 7.36 亿美元的协议，用于建设三条输电线路。【原文：Kenya signed a $736 million deal with Adani Energy Solutions Ltd. for the construction of three power lines, according to Energy Secretary Opiyo Wandayi.】

item.title: Ecopetrol 在推迟美元债券交易后利用住友贷款
item.description: Ecopetrol SA 在本周推迟在国际市场上出售债券后，正利用与三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation）的贷款偿还其他债务。【原文：Ecopetrol SA is using a loan with Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation to pay down other debt after it postponed the sale of bonds in the international market this week.】

item.title: 美国信贷吸引外国投资者，希望降低避险成本
item.description: 外国投资者一直在购买更多的美国企业债券，随着美联储宽松货币政策降低对冲成本，以及投资者追求收益，这一趋势很可能会持续下去。【原文：Foreign investors have been buying more US corporate bonds, a trend that will likely continue as Federal Reserve monetary easing lowers the cost of hedging and investors hunt for yield.】

item.title: 佩梅克斯公司休斯顿地区炼油厂化学品泄漏造成两人死亡
item.description: 墨西哥国营石油公司在休斯敦地区的一家炼油厂发生化学品泄漏事故，造成 2 人死亡，35 人受伤。【原文：Two people are dead and 35 are injured after a chemical release at a Houston area refinery owned by Mexico’s state oil company.】

item.title: 卢拉提出扩大所得税免税范围，巴西雷亚尔下挫
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）表示，他希望在现有承诺的基础上对工资不超过5000雷亚尔（893美元）的工人实行更大的所得税减免，这加剧了投资者对财政政策的担忧。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said he wants bigger income tax exemptions beyond his existing pledge for workers with salaries of up to 5,000 reais ($893), adding to investor worries about fiscal policy.】

item.title: 奥斯坦-古尔斯比解读美联储大幅降息
item.description:
以及现在的风险所在。【原文：

And where the risks are now.

】

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙竞选财政部长：永不褪色的理念
item.description:
这位摩根大通老板的名字已经流传了25年。在这次总统竞选中，他的呼声一如既往地高，甚至戴蒙本人也在淡化这种可能性。【原文：

The JPMorgan boss’s name has been floated for 25 years. This presidential race, the chatter is as loud as ever—even as Dimon himself downplays the chances.

】

item.title: 淡马锡首席信息官支持被其他基金冷落的资产洗牌基金
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte. is getting behind a controversial type of fund that private equity firms are using to ride out the slump in deal-making.】

item.title: Intrum 正在进行谈判，以争取持反对意见的债权人达成债务协议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Intrum AB 正在与持异议的债权人进行谈判，以说服他们签署重组方案。【原文：Intrum AB is in talks with holdout creditors to persuade them to sign up to its restructuring proposal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 施罗德指出私人信贷繁荣中的房地产价值
item.description: 随着资金涌入私人信贷和资产融资市场，施罗德资本看到了银行一直回避的住房和商业地产债务的投资空间。【原文：As money pours into private credit and asset-based finance markets, Schroders Capital sees scope to invest in the housing and commercial real estate debt that banks have been shunning.】

item.title: K2 Insurance 通过新的 5.35 亿美元贷款降低借款成本
item.description: K2 保险服务公司出售了一笔大于计划的杠杆贷款，因为该公司将与收购相关的融资借款成本降低了三个百分点。【原文：K2 Insurance Services sold a bigger-than-planned leveraged loan as the firm cuts borrowing costs on buyout-related financing by three percentage points.】

item.title: 由 OpenAI 创始人支持的加密初创公司将推出衍生品交易所
item.description: 据一位熟悉该计划的人士透露，由包括 OpenAI 创始人 Sam Altman 在内的投资者支持的区块链数据公司 Arkham Intelligence Inc.【原文：Arkham Intelligence Inc., a blockchain data company backed by investors including OpenAI founder Sam Altman, is planning to launch a crypto derivatives exchange next month, according to a person familiar with the initiative.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行模型风险主管门西亚据说将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）的一位顶级风险专家将在七年后离开这家西班牙银行。【原文：One of Banco Santander SA’s top risk experts is leaving the Spanish lender after seven years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 债券交易员一周大交易结束，美联储降息更加不确定
item.description: 债券市场越来越不相信美联储会在今年再降息两次。【原文：The bond market is growing less convinced by the day that the Federal Reserve will embark on two further interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 谷歌利用影响力和最后通牒达成加州新闻交易
item.description: 谷歌正在商议斥资 1.1 亿美元支持加州苦苦挣扎的新闻业，但这家搜索巨头有一个要求：纳税人也需要捐助数千万美元。【原文：Google was negotiating to spend $110 million to support California’s struggling journalism industry, but the search giant had a demand: taxpayers would need to contribute tens of millions of dollars as well.】

item.title: 科学即将找到治疗疼痛的新方法
item.description:
在本集《汉娜-弗莱的未来》中，她将探讨可使医学超越阿片类药物及其致命后果的前沿研究。【原文：

On this episode of The Future with Hannah Fry, she explores cutting-edge research that could move medicine beyond opioids and their deadly fallout.

】

item.title: 法国政府称提高电力税不会打击消费者
item.description: 法国表示，提高电力税的提议不会损害大多数家庭的利益，因为法国的目标是以 606 亿欧元（约合 663 亿美元）的资金解决其岌岌可危的公共财政问题，并重建投资者的信心。【原文：France says a proposed increase to its power tax won’t hurt most households as it aims to deliver a €60.6 billion ($66.3 billion) fix for its creaking public finances and rebuild investor confidence.】

item.title: 印度工业产值两年来首次下降
item.description: 印度 8 月份的工业生产出现了近两年来的首次萎缩，使世界上扩张速度最快的经济体增长放缓的迹象更加明显。【原文：India’s industrial production contracted for the first time in almost two years in August, adding to signs that growth in the world’s fastest-expanding economy is moderating.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为尽管巴西经济增长回升，但巴西股市依然黯淡无光
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师尼古拉-利普曼（Nikolaj Lippmann）表示，巴西经济增长速度超过预期，股票价格也很便宜。但他警告说，不要指望这会转化为股市的反弹。【原文：Brazil’s economy is growing faster than expected and stocks are cheap, said Morgan Stanley strategist Nikolaj Lippmann. Just don’t expect that to translate into a rally in equities, he warned.】

item.title: 欧洲风力发电量因飓风 "柯克 "余波而飙升
item.description: 飓风 "柯克 "的余威继续对欧洲造成影响，据彭博模型预测，周日的风力将达到二月份以来的最高值。【原文：The remnants of Hurricane Kirk are continuing to have an impact on Europe with the highest wind generation on Sunday since February forecast by Bloomberg models.】

item.title: 俄罗斯力推金砖国家支付系统，旨在打破美国的主导地位
item.description: 俄罗斯正在提议改变金砖国家之间进行的跨境支付，目的是规避全球金融体系，因为这个受到严厉惩罚的国家正在努力保护自己的经济不受制裁。【原文：Russia is proposing changes to cross-border payments conducted among BRICS countries aimed at circumventing the global financial system, as the heavily penalized country seeks to sanctions-proof its own economy.】

item.title: CoreWeave 完成 6.5 亿美元信贷融资，推动人工智能云计算发展
item.description: 由摩根大通、高盛和摩根士丹利牵头的 6.5 亿美元信用贷款已经完成，该贷款将用于支持公司的发展。【原文：CoreWeave Inc., a cloud-computing provider that’s among the most valuable artificial intelligence startups, has closed a $650 million credit facility led by JPMorgan, Goldman Sachs, and Morgan Stanley that is intended to be used to support growth.】

item.title: 芝加哥马拉松赛将向创下世界纪录后去世的肯尼亚人致敬
item.description: 今年的美国银行芝加哥马拉松赛将充满苦乐参半的味道。【原文：There will be a bittersweet taste to this year’s Bank of America Chicago Marathon.】

item.title: Apax Partners 将停止医疗保健投资并解散团队
item.description: Apax Partners 已决定停止对医疗保健资产的新投资，因为这家私募股权公司认为该行业的机会越来越少。【原文：Apax Partners has decided to halt new investments into health care assets as the private equity firm sees fewer opportunities in the industry.】

item.title: 暴雨过后，法国玉米收成 11 年来最慢
item.description: 由于恶劣天气给欧洲第一大农业生产国造成巨大损失，法国的玉米收割进度是 11 年来最慢的。【原文：France’s corn harvest is progressing at the slowest pace in 11 years as adverse weather takes a huge toll on Europe’s top agricultural producer.】
